description: This file defines a Spring Data JPA repository interface for 'Event' entities, providing methods for querying events based on organizer, tags, and time range with pagination support.

classes.name: EventRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for Event entities, providing custom query methods for filtering and pagination.

methods.name: findByOrganizerContainingIgnoreCase
methods.description: Finds paginated events where the organizer contains the specified string, case-insensitive.

methods.name: findByTagsContainingIgnoreCase
methods.description: Finds paginated events where the tags contain the specified string, case-insensitive.

methods.name: findByStartTimeGreaterThanEqualAndEndTimeLessThanEqual
methods.description: Finds paginated events occurring within a specified time range.

methods.name: findByOrganizerContainingIgnoreCaseAndTagsContainingIgnoreCase
methods.description: Finds paginated events matching organizer and tags filters, both case-insensitive.

methods.name: findByOrganizerContainingIgnoreCaseAndStartTimeGreaterThanEqualAndEndTimeLessThanEqual
methods.description: Finds paginated events matching organizer and occurring within a time range.

methods.name: findByTagsContainingIgnoreCaseAndStartTimeGreaterThanEqualAndEndTimeLessThanEqual
methods.description: Finds paginated events matching tags and occurring within a time range.

methods.name: findByOrganizerContainingIgnoreCaseAndTagsContainingIgnoreCaseAndStartTimeGreaterThanEqualAndEndTimeLessThanEqual
methods.description: Finds paginated events matching organizer, tags, and time range filters.
